alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 13 at 10:00PM CST until November 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light snow is expected across the Texas and Oklahoma Panhandles. Total snow accumulations ranging from 2 to 3 inches across the Oklahoma Panhandle as well as the northern and eastern sections of the Texas Panhandle. Up to one inch of total snow accumulation is expected across portions of the southwest and south central Texas Panhandle. North winds of 20 to 30 mph with higher gusts may result in blowing snow which could lead to reduced visibilities at times. * WHERE...All of the Texas and Oklahoma Panhandles except Deaf Smith county. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
